# Efstathios Georgopoulos - Professional Portfolio

> Financial Crime Compliance Expert & Blockchain Specialist

## About
Multilingual Compliance & Blockchain Specialist with deep expertise in AML/CFT, fraud detection, and forensic financial analysis. Currently working as Financial Crime Compliance Quality Assurance Analyst at Ebury, Madrid, Spain.

## Experience Summary
- Financial Crime Compliance Quality Assurance Analyst at Ebury (Current)
- Former Compliance roles at American Express
- Transaction Monitoring at Eurobank Greece
- Fraud and AML/CFT Investigation at National Bank of Greece

## Education
- Master's in Compliance (In Progress) - IMF & Universidad Católica de Ávila
- MSc in Fintech & Blockchain - ENEB & Universidad Isabel I
- BA in Spanish Language & Literature - National and Kapodistrian University of Athens

## Certifications
- Fintech & Digital Transformation
- Blockchain Certification
- AML Certifications (Financial Crime Academy and ACAMS)
- GDPR Compliance
- Crypto Compliance
- KYC/CDD
